AboutUs.des1: Ashyo offers market-priced household appliances and electronics. For over 2 years, we have provided customers with a wide assortment of products and reliable service.
AboutUs.des2: Ashyo was established in 2022 in Tashkent. Today, we operate 26 stores across the capital and regions.
AboutUs.des3: You can purchase goods in any convenient way: in our retail stores or on the website. An online payment plan is available for household appliances. A passport is required for registration.
AboutUs.des4: Legal entities can make purchases via bank transfer without any extra fees.

Footer.questionPlaceholder: Ask any question you're interested in
